title: Salted Hashes And Their Security
author: Ludvik
summary: So, what is a hash? Well, a hash is essentially a one-way conversion of any data to a fixed-length value that canâ€™t be decrypted to its original value, hence the meaning of one-way.

title: Practical Web Pentest Associate (PWPA) Certification Review
author: Ludvik
summary: In early March this year (2024), I managed to pass the Practical Web Pentest Associate (PWPA) certification from TCM Security. Leading up to taking this exam, I had a lot of questions surrounding the exam itself and web application penetration testing, and the goal of this little review is to answer a few of those questions I had before taking it, after passing, to potentially guide and help future exam takers on a good path.
